availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Chesterfield Warren (Franklin co postmaster, forks of elkhorn)

body.p: Franklin County, Kentucky, merchant and postmaster. Postmaster of Forks of Elkhorn in Franklin County from February 7, 1855, to August 2, 1866. Merchant in Franklin County in 1860.

ab.bibl: U.S., Appointments of U. S. Postmasters, 1832-1971 [database on-line]. Provo, UT, USA: Ancestry.com Operations, Inc., 2010. Original data: Record of Appointment of Postmasters, 1832-1971. NARA Microfilm Publication, M841, 145 rolls. Records of the Post Office Department, Record Group Number 28. Washington, D.C.: National Archives, Forks of Elkhorn, Franklin County, KY, Volume 28, 7 Feb 1855, p. 69. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District 1, Forks of Elkhorn, p. 11. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Forks of Elkhorn District, p. 24.
